data.title: "Vrata_Splita": The Instagram Account You Should Be Following in Split
data.meta_description: “Vrata Splita”, translated to “Split doors”, is a photographic project showing Split through an especially unique way: through the various building doors throughout the city of Split. An idea that came to fruition back in February of this year, father-daughter duo Gojko and Tei Radić felt inspired by the many Instagram profiles that existed and ... Read more
data.text:
“Vrata Splita”, translated to “Split doors”, is a photographic project showing Split through an especially unique way: through the various building doors throughout the city of Split.

An idea that came to fruition back in February of this year, father-daughter duo Gojko and Tei Radić felt inspired by the many Instagram profiles that existed and were similar to what is now “Vrata Splita”. Because walking the streets of Split is always a treasure trove of raw beauty, ancient history, and a new age, Tei and Gojko felt that Split was the perfect recipient to create a project like this of their own.

Gojko, Tei’s father, is in charge of taking the photos, while daughter Tei is in charge of publishing the photos onto their Instagram account. How to do they pick what they want to capture? Surely, it’s what catches the eye.

Images by Vrata Splita

Thus far, this creative duo has captured everything from the gate of Diocletian’s palace, the “golden door”, the fish market, cinemas, and even various homes throughout the city.

In an effort to stop chasing through life as much and to stop, smell the roses, and capture the beauty all around you, Split really does have a lot to charm to offer – and through “Vrata Splita” you can see Split through a totally different light.

You can follow the official Instagram account here.
